subject: Public Speaking
title: Cesar Chavez: Worker's Voice
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Cesar Chavez: Worker's Voice.

hook.text: Chavez organized farmworkers through speeches, marches, and fasts.

buildup.text: His rhetoric combined nonviolence with urgent calls for dignity.

discovery.text: He spoke to workers in their own language about their own lives.

twist.text: Chavez showed that speaking for your community requires humility.

climax.text: The most effective leaders speak WITH their people, not AT them.

punchline.text: Lead by speaking with, not at, your community.
